text: Neoterebra bridgesi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.{MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Neoterebra bridgesi (Dall, 1908). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=1416046 on 2020-01-24 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Fedosov, A. title: Neoterebra bridgesi
